name: Clicky Galaxy
description:
Clicky Galaxy

Clicky Galaxy is a casual point-and-click, match-three game developed with Unity.

Click on a planet and then click on a destination for it to move to. If there isn't a valid path (planets can only move horizontally or vertically but not diagonally), the planet will remain in place and you may click to deselect it. Three or more in a row or column result in a match and you win points! New planets are spawned every time after you move and the game ends when planets fill up the entire grid.


If you experience issues with itch.io's browser play (for example, high score not being recorded because of a lack of support for Unity's PlayerPrefs, or, game stuck on loading because your browser disables cookies), you may also check out Clicky Galaxy on Unity Play. Check out my GitHub repo for the source code.
